p: Among the highly expressed genes in MT, the second highest expression was noted for a TIFY-5A-like protein ( Ma07_g01220). This gene is known for its role as a repressor of Jasmonate responses [ 34, 35]. Three genes annotated as phospholipase A1-II 5-like showed increased expression in MT ( gene-C4D60_Mb07t09300, Ma02_g10300, and Ma08_g26980). Phospholipase As are involved in root elongation as well as in auxin signaling [ 36].
